games.title: Squid Game : Red Light, Green Light
games.description: Step into the arena. In this deadly game of Red Light, Green Light, one wrong move is your last. Can you survive three rounds of pure, nail-biting tension? The doll is watching.
games.author: Aritra

games.title: Chor Police Dakat Babu
games.description: A classic Indian game of wits and deception. Are you the cunning Chor, the loyal Police, or the commanding Babu? Outsmart your opponents in a high-stakes chase where every command counts.
games.author: Aritra

games.title: FPS Shooter Game
games.description: Lock and load. You're dropped into a hostile zone swarming with bandits. Your mission: eliminate every threat. With immersive 3D visuals and fast-paced action, this is a pure fight for survival.
games.author: Tamonash

games.title: Dino 3D Game
games.description: The internet is down, but the apocalypse is just beginning. The iconic chrome dino breaks free into a 3D world of endless chaos. How long can you outrun extinction?
games.author: Ayan

games.title: Djakji: The Game
games.description: Test your reflexes in this fast-paced arcade thriller. Flip, dodge, and survive as you navigate a treacherous world of falling tiles. One wrong move, and it's game over. How long can you last?
games.author: Aritra
